summary.span: Represents a collection of constraints for a .

span.span: Represents a collection of constraints for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过访问属性。The is accessed through the property. 可以同时包含和对象。The can contain both and objects for the . A对象可确保特定列中的数据始终是唯一的以保持数据的完整性。A object makes sure that data in a specific column is always unique to preserve the data integrity. 确定发生在相关表时中的数据更新或删除。The determines what will occur in related tables when data in the is either updated or deleted. 例如，如果删除了某行，将确定相关的行是否还删除 （级联），或某些其他过程的操作。For example, if a row is deleted, the will determine whether the related rows are also deleted (a cascade), or some other course of action. > [!NOTE] > 当你将添加创建到两个表之间的关系，这两个和自动创建。When you add a that creates a relationship between two tables to a , both a and a are created automatically. 应用于父代中的主键列，并将约束添加到该表的。The is applied to the primary key column in the parent , and the constraint is added to that table's . 应用于的主键列和外键列，并将约束添加到子表的。The is applied to the primary key column and the foreign key column, and the constraint is added to the child table's . 使用标准的收集方法，如， ，和。The uses standard collection methods such as , , and . 此外，方法可以用于查找集合中的特定约束是否存在。In addition, the method can be used to look for the existence of a particular constraint in the collection. A时，将创建与其属性设置为`true`添加到对象的。A is created when a with its property set to `true` is added to a object's . A时，将创建添加到对象的。A is created when a is added to a object's . ## Examples 第一个示例创建，并将添加(使用其属性设置为`true`) 到。The first example creates a , and adds a (with its property set to `true`) to the . 第二个示例创建、 两个对象、 四个列，和一个。The second example creates a , two objects, four columns, and a . 约束的计数然后打印显示和时，会创建添加到对象的。The count of constraints is then printed to show that a and a are created when a is added to the object's . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已调用`AddRange`不将任何对象添加到集合中，直到调用。If has been called, `AddRange` does not add any objects to the collection until is called. 时，`EndInit`是调用，该集合将使用最新的调用中指定的项方式进行填充`AddRange`。At the time that `EndInit` is called, the collection will be populated with the items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange`. 如果`AddRange`多次调用中`BeginInit` / `EndInit`仅对最新的调用中指定这些项排序`AddRange`添加。If `AddRange` is called multiple times within a `BeginInit` / `EndInit` sequence, only those items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange` are added. ## Examples 下面的示例创建主键和外键约束，并将它们添加到。The following example creates primary and foreign key constraints, and adds them to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认行为时添加到，是将添加到父表和到子表。The default behavior whenever a is added to a , is to add a to the parent table and a to the child table. 应用于父表的主键列和应用到子表的外键列。The is applied to the primary key column of the parent table, and the is applied to the foreign key column of the child table. 因为尝试删除之前删除引发一个异常的原因，你应始终使用方法之前调用 Remove，若要确保可以删除。Because trying to remove the before removing the causes an exception to be thrown, you should always use the method before calling Remove, to make sure that the can be removed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来确定是否可以删除，然后再尝试将其删除。The following example uses the method to determine whether a can be removed, before trying to remove it. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
